amendment.description: To increase spending for the Maternal and Child Health Block Grant by $184,000,000 in fiscal year 2009, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4253 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4253 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2066) To increase spending for the Maternal and Child Health Block Grant by $184,000,000 in fiscal year 2009, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4253 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4253 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dodd.
